Ian Gabriel bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye nduzi azụmahịa nke South Africa nke bi na Cape Town, South Africa

Ọ duziri ihe nkiri Forgiveness nke Arnold Vosloo na-eme, nke na-ekwu maka mgbaghara na South Africa mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị. A họọrọ ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2013 a kpọrọ Four Corners dị ka ntinye South Africa maka Best Foreign Language Film na 86th Academy Awards
